options.baggage_note: Check offer details for baggage allowance
options.notes: Direct flight, fastest option. Book in advance for best pricing. Airport transfer time: 2-3 hours total (1.5 hours before departure + arrival processing).

options.route: Chongqing Shapingba Station → Chengdu East Station

departure.access_method: Metro Line 18 (7 stops) + Metro Line 9 (4 stops) from city center

arrival.access_method: Metro Line 2 to Tianfu Square (7 stops)

options.notes: Most economical option. Total journey includes metro connections in both cities. High-speed rail segment is approximately 1-1.5 hours. Book 2 weeks in advance for discounts. Luggage allowance included.

options.route: Chongqing West Station → Chengdu East Station

departure.access_method: Metro Ring Line from Aoticenter Station (5 stops)

arrival.access_method: Metro Line 2 to Tianfu Square (7 stops)

options.notes: Alternative train option via Chongqing West Station. Longer journey time than G8638. Book in advance for discounts.
Approximately 4-5 hours driving via expressway. Fuel and toll costs estimated. Not recommended for travelers without China driving license. Consider traffic conditions and weather.

recommendation.reasoning: For budget travelers, the high-speed train offers excellent value at ~$21 USD with reliable service and city-center connections. For time-sensitive travel or business trips, the flight saves ~1-2 hours total journey time but costs ~$50 USD. The flight requires additional airport transfer time (2-3 hours total including check-in and arrival processing).

skills_used.notes: Real-time flight pricing and schedules retrieved successfully
Transit routing successful with detailed segment data. Driving route API failed but distance data retrieved from transit response.

weather_considerations: February is late winter in both cities. Check forecast before departure for potential delays in rainy/foggy conditions. High-speed trains are generally more reliable than flights in poor weather.

booking_recommendations.flights: Book 2-4 weeks in advance for best pricing. Airlines: Check China Eastern, Sichuan Airlines for additional options.
booking_recommendations.trains: Book 15-30 days in advance via 12306.cn (official railway) or trip.com. Peak travel periods (Chinese New Year) require earlier booking.
booking_recommendations.timing: Morning departures (7-9am) recommended to maximize time in Chengdu. Avoid Friday evening/Sunday evening peak commuter traffic.
